short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Receive important alerts and notifications from your organization using AlertusÂ® mass notification software.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Alertus Desktop for Chrome allows public safety personnel to relay important emergency alert information to your computer. 

Are you an existing Alertus customer or system administrator? This extension requires licensed and up-to-date Alertus software to function. For more information or to purchase licenses, contact your Alertus Account Manager.

Prerequisites:
Server Version: Summer Release 2020
